docs.snippet: Mr. Lightfoot has filled in since the end of the Obama administration. The agency has never gone this long without a leader confirmed by the Senate.

headline.print_headline: Even as It Lacks Leader, NASA Loses Top Official
headline.main: Robert Lightfoot, NASA’s Acting Administrator, to Retire as Trump’s Nominee Is Stalled

docs.snippet: Even as the State Department weighs approval of more than $1 billion in new arms, lawmakers are pushing for a resolution that they say would prevent Washington from giving the Saudis “a blank check.”

headline.print_headline: Before Saudi’s Visit, Pentagon Implores Congress Not to Block Military Aid
headline.main: Before Saudi Visit, Congress Questions U.S. Support for Yemen Campaign

docs.snippet: A complex system has developed to mute women who accuse powerful men. One of those women is an actress who said she had an affair with Donald J. Trump.
President Trump has threatened to blow up global trade rules. Robert Lighthizer is the one who knows where to plant the explosives.

headline.main: The Little-Known Trade Adviser Who Wields Enormous Power in Washington

docs.snippet: The woman President Trump has chosen to lead the C.I.A. assisted torture and helped deceive the American people. Other women should not be applauding.

headline.print_headline: Gina Haspel’s Rise Is No Victory for Feminism
headline.main: Gina Haspel’s Rise Is No Victory for Feminism

docs.snippet: South Korea says the North is open to negotiations with the United States over its nuclear program but wants military threats eliminated and its security guaranteed.

headline.print_headline: Offer From North Korea To Enter Nuclear Talks  With U.S. Raises Hopes
headline.main: Raising Hopes, North Korea Offers to Talk About Its Nuclear Arsenal

docs.snippet: Remember when Mike Pence said Donald Trump would bring the highest level of integrity to the Oval Office?

docs.snippet: The change of a single word in the new tax law means baseball, basketball and other sports franchises could now face capital gains taxes every time they exchange players.

headline.print_headline: Curveball in New Tax Law: Trades Are Trickier, Thanks to One Word
headline.main: A Curveball From the New Tax Law: It Makes Baseball Trades Harder

docs.snippet: Donald Trump is a bystander in his own administration — and that could be more trouble than the woes of Hope Hicks or Jared Kushner.

headline.print_headline: The Root of White House Chaos
headline.main: The Root of White House Chaos? A Weak President
